definition: to decrease/to lose/to damage/to harm/(coll.) to speak sarcastically/to deride/caustic/mean/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (䷨)

sentences.english: Perfecting the contract text and avoid legal loss.
sentences.chinese: 完善合同文本，避免法律損失。

sentences.english: We reserve the right to claim damages.
sentences.chinese: 我們保留索賠損失的權利。

sentences.english: The utility model thoroughly solves the wind-proof problem and the slide-proof problem; heavy equipment can not be damaged by the utility model.
sentences.chinese: 徹底解決了防風抗滑問題，保住重大設備不受損失。

sentences.english: The loss of tin in the sulphide copper concentrate was less than 4%.
sentences.chinese: 同時錫在銅精礦中的損失也不到4%。

sentences.english: Fire insurance may be sold by appealing to fear of loss.
sentences.chinese: 火險可能是通過喚起對損失的恐懼而售出的。

sentences.english: CCS will not be liable for any loss due to any error of the applicant or any other person.
sentences.chinese: 本社對因申請方或他人的過錯造成的損失不負責。

sentences.english: At present, China's commercial banks is also difficult to accurately estimate the expected loss of non-lending.
sentences.chinese: 目前，我國商業銀行還難以準確估算貸款非預期損失。

sentences.english: All varieties tested lost yield and value in treatment 5.
sentences.chinese: 處理5所有參試品種的產量和產值均有損失。

sentences.english: Part of that revenue loss, however, would be recouped through other taxes.
sentences.chinese: 但是，這些稅收的部分損失將從別的稅種上補償回來。

sentences.english: The current vegetable price slump has taken its toll on Chinese farmers.
sentences.chinese: 近日蔬菜價格暴跌使廣大的中國菜農損失慘重。

sentences.english: The result is that many have jeopardized their performance in the long run.
sentences.chinese: 結果就使得他們在長遠經營中蒙受一定的損失。

sentences.english: Considering the losses in the disaster area, our support was an utterly inadequate measure.
sentences.chinese: 比起災區的損失，我們的支援不過杯水車薪。

sentences.english: Berlin estimates it lost a record five million euros last year to fare dodgers.
sentences.chinese: 柏林估計它去年由於逃票人造成了五百萬英鎊的損失。

sentences.english: That fire destroyed 38,000 acres and 21 homes.
sentences.chinese: 火火災造成了3萬8千英畝土地和21戶住宅的損失。

sentences.english: They were appalled by the damage from the fire.
sentences.chinese: 他們對火災所造成的損失感到震驚。

sentences.english: It is impossible for me to recoup.
sentences.chinese: 叫我來彌補損失是不可能的。

definition: to hit/to strike/to attack/to crack down on sth/blow/(psychological) shock/percussion (music)
to attack/to batter/(of waves) to pound against/shock/impact
to compensate for loss/to indemnify/to suffer a financial loss
to lead to/to create/to cause/to bring about
